snippet: A video clip of a weeping Japanese politician accused of dubious spending on trips to a hot springs has gone viral, leaving many outraged and puzzled....

headline.print_headline: Video of Japan Politician Weeping Goes Viral
headline.main: Video of Japan Politician Weeping Goes Viral

lead_paragraph: A video clip of a weeping Japanese politician accused of dubious spending on trips to a hot springs has gone viral, leaving many outraged and puzzled.
